comments.text:
I just had this happen on a try build I made (which had the name 'FirefoxNightlyDebug'), though I can confirm that it doesn't seem to happen in a real nightly.

This does still happen on the latest ESR nightly, however. The Nomoroka (3.6.29pre) nightly does not have the fancy background at all, and the Applications shortcut is to the left of the built app.

On the basis of the ESR and custom builds, I'm going to reopen this.

comments.raw_text: And it's not happening on the opt build, so this might actually be related to naming.
comments.text: And it's not happening on the opt build, so this might actually be related to naming.

comments.raw_text:
Yes, I do see that.

This isn't really my area, but my guess is that you're right and the problem is that the pre-baked .DS_Store file has an icon location entry for FirefoxNightly.app (the app bundle name for opt builds), but not for NightlyDebug.app (the app bundle name for debug builds).
comments.text:
Yes, I do see that.
